{{Description|Band the Naku Weed into a loop about your waist, and it shall exorcise evil.}}
'''Sanctifying Ring''' is [[Kuki Shinobu]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Grass Ring of Sanctification will deal DMG '''8''' times.
* {{TalentNote|particles|Grass Ring of Sanctification DMG or Kuki Shinobu's [[To Sever Sealing|4th Constellation]]|0.45}}
** This particle generation has a cooldown of '''0.2''' seconds.
** At Constellation 0–1, this skill generates an average of '''3.6''' particles.
** At Constellation 2–3, this skill generates an average of '''4.5''' particles.
** At Constellation 4 and above, this skill generates an average of '''5.85''' particles.
* The activation DMG of this skill is a [[Blunt Attack]].
* {{TalentNote|icd|Skill DMG|2.5|3|Grass Ring of Sanctification DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|no snapshot|Skill DMG|character=Kuki Shinobu}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Sanctifying Ring|ascension|2|Heart's Repose|increases Sanctifying Ring's healing amount and damage dealt based on Kuki Shinobu's [[Elemental Mastery]]. The healing amount is increased by 75% of her Elemental Mastery, and the damage dealt is increased by 25% of her Elemental Mastery.}}

<big>'''Constellation Effects'''</big>
* {{TalentNote|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Sanctifying Ring|constellation|2|To Forsake Fortune}}
** With this Constellation, Grass Ring of Sanctification will deal DMG '''10''' times.
* {{TalentNote|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Sanctifying Ring|constellation|3|To Sequester Sorrow}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Sanctifying Ring|constellation|4|To Sever Sealing}}
